title: Schur-Weyl Duality for Toroidal Algebras of Type $A$
authors:
Vyjayanthi Chari, Lauren Grimley, Zongzhu Lin, Chad R. Mangum,
  Christine Uhl, Evan Wilson
abstract:
We state and prove an analog of the Schur-Weyl duality for a quotient of the
classical $2$-toroidal Lie algebra of type $A$. We then provide a method to
extend this duality to the $m$-toroidal case, $m > 2$.
